name: Silver Legacy Resort Casino
description: Located in the heart of downtown Reno, Silver Legacy Resort Casino towers above the city as the newest and tallest casino hotel. Spacious guest rooms and suites offer grand views of the city skyline and mountains. Part of THE ROW complex with Eldorado and Circus Circus.
shortDescription: Downtown Reno's tallest casino hotel with Ramsay's Kitchen, THE ROW complex access, and grand mountain views.
highlights: Part of THE ROW (Eldorado & Circus Circus)
amenities: Free parking in Silver Legacy garage

roomTypes.name: Standard Room
roomTypes.description: Comfortable rooms with city or mountain views.

roomTypes.name: Suite
roomTypes.description: Spacious suites with separate living area.

dining.name: Ramsay's Kitchen
dining.description: Gordon Ramsay fine dining — Beef Wellington, Lobster Risotto.

dining.name: Spa Café & Bar
dining.description: Light, health-conscious meals near the spa.

parking: Free parking in Silver Legacy garage

faqs.question: What is Silver Legacy's signature feature?
faqs.answer: The iconic silver dome that towers over downtown Reno. Inside, the dome houses a mining-themed centerpiece that lights up with a dramatic show.

faqs.question: Is Silver Legacy connected to other casinos?
faqs.answer: Yes — Silver Legacy is the center of THE ROW, connected to Eldorado and Circus Circus via enclosed skywalks.

faqs.question: What dining is available?
faqs.answer: Multiple options including Ruth's Chris Steak House, Pearl Oyster Bar & Grill, Canter's Delicatessen (the famous LA deli), The Stir cocktail lounge, and more.

meta.title: Silver Legacy Resort Casino Reno | Golf Stay and Play Packages
meta.description: Stay at Silver Legacy in downtown Reno. Ramsay's Kitchen, THE ROW access, and custom golf packages with 20+ courses.

testimonials.quote: Silver Legacy Resort Casino exceeded our expectations. The staff was incredibly accommodating with our group of 24 — early breakfast, late checkout, bag storage. Everything GTHS promised about this property was accurate.
testimonials.author: Pete J.

testimonials.quote: We've stayed at several Reno properties for golf trips and Silver Legacy Resort Casino is now our go-to. Great amenities, solid dining options, and the rooms are comfortable after a long day on the course.
testimonials.author: Rick O.

testimonials.quote: Stayed at Silver Legacy Resort Casino for our golf trip and it was the perfect home base. Rooms were clean and spacious, location was ideal for hitting courses around Reno. GTHS got us a group rate we couldn't find anywhere else.
testimonials.author: Christine P.
